minor_use_rule.name: Minor Use Rule
minor_use_rule.description: Exemptions for minor uses within a building that don't significantly impact energy performance
minor_use_rule.conditions: The exempted area must be less than 10% of the total floor area

heritage_buildings.name: Heritage Buildings
heritage_buildings.description: Exemptions for buildings with heritage significance
heritage_buildings.conditions: Building must have listed heritage status

small_buildings.name: Small Buildings Exemption
small_buildings.description: Exemptions for buildings with small floor areas
small_buildings.conditions: Total floor area must be less than 500m²

temporary_buildings.name: Temporary Buildings
temporary_buildings.description: Exemptions for buildings intended for temporary use
temporary_buildings.conditions: Building must be designed for temporary use (less than 2 years)

remote_locations.name: Remote Locations
remote_locations.description: Exemptions for buildings in remote locations with limited access to services
remote_locations.conditions: Building must be in a remote location as defined by the NCC
